TableView.name: VIEW_SMP4_PAINEL_ACOMP
TableView.afterCreate:
CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW "EASYVIEW"."VIEW_SMP4_PAINEL_ACOMP" ("DATA", "PMM", "SMP4", "CN") AS
WITH Dias AS
(SELECT UNIQUE TO_CHAR(Dt.DATA, 'dd') AS Data
FROM CDRVIEW_SMP4 Dt
WHERE TO_CHAR(Dt.DATA, 'dd') >= 1
AND TO_CHAR(Dt.DATA, 'dd') <= 10
),
MesAno AS
(SELECT UNIQUE TO_CHAR(Dt.DATA, 'mm/yyyy') AS Data FROM CDRVIEW_SMP4 Dt
),
Dia_X_Mes_X_Ano AS
(SELECT Concat(Concat(Dias.Data, '/'), Mesano.Data) AS data
FROM Dias Dias,
Mesano Mesano
),
dados_traducao_sem_vinculo as
(select DATA, HORA, PMM, CN, MSC, OK1, OKVM, OK1_TCT, OK1_DRP, OK1_DRP_TCT, CHAM, BAC, NR_VM, SCV, INEX, DESL, BLO, SC, INV from view_msc_vinculo_smp4 where codigo != 'NID'
),
Smps_dados AS
(SELECT Data AS DATA,
Pmm AS PMM,
TO_CHAR(CN) AS CN,
CASE
WHEN Smp4_B = '0'
AND Smp4_A != '-'
THEN '0,00'
WHEN Smp4_B = '-'
AND Smp4_A = '-'
THEN '-'
WHEN Smp4_B != '-'
AND Smp4_A = '-'
THEN '0,00'
ELSE NVL(trim(TO_CHAR(ROUND((Smp4_A * 100 / SMP4_B), 2),'999990D99')), '-')
END AS smp4
FROM
(SELECT TRUNC(Tab.DATA) AS Data,
pmm.NOME AS Pmm,
Tab.CN,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(Tab.OK1, 0) + NVL(Tab.OKVM, 0) + NVL(Tab.OK1_TCT, 0) + NVL(Tab.OK1_DRP, 0) + NVL(Tab.OK1_DRP_TCT, 0))), '-') AS Smp4_A,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM((NVL(Tab.CHAM, 0) - NVL(Tab.INV, 0) - (NVL(Tab.SCV, 0) + NVL(Tab.BAC, 0) + NVL(Tab.INEX, 0) + NVL(Tab.DESL, 0) + NVL(Tab.BLO, 0) + NVL(Tab.SC, 0))))), '-') AS Smp4_B
FROM
view_msc_cn_ativo_smp4 b,
dados_traducao_sem_vinculo Tab
INNER JOIN PMM pmm
ON Tab.HORA BETWEEN pmm.INICIO AND pmm.FIM
WHERE TO_CHAR(Tab.DATA, 'dd') IN
(SELECT Dias.Data FROM Dias
)
and tab.msc = b.msc
and tab.cn = b.cn
and to_date(to_char(tab.data,'MM/yyyy'),'MM/yyyy') = b.periodo
and b.status = 'T'
GROUP BY TRUNC(Tab.DATA),
pmm.NOME,
Tab.CN
)
),
Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm AS
(SELECT to_date(D.data, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS Data,
Cn.nome,
Pmm.NOME AS Pmm
FROM CN Cn,
Dia_X_Mes_X_Ano D,
PMM Pmm
),
Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp AS
(SELECT NVL(TRUNC(Smpdados.DATA), Diascnpmm.Data) AS Data,
Diascnpmm.Pmm,
NVL(TO_CHAR(Smpdados.smp4), '-') AS Smp4,
Diascnpmm.nome AS Cn
FROM Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm Diascnpmm,
Smps_Dados Smpdados
WHERE TRUNC(Diascnpmm.Data) = TRUNC(Smpdados.DATA(+))
AND Diascnpmm.Pmm = Smpdados.PMM(+)
AND Diascnpmm.nome = Smpdados.CN(+)
)
SELECT TO_CHAR(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Data, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DATA,
Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Pmm,
CASE
WHEN Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Smp4 != '-'
AND TO_NUMBER(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Smp4) > 100
THEN '100,00'
ELSE replace(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Smp4,'.',',')
END AS SMP4,
TO_CHAR(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Cn) AS CN
FROM Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp
ORDER BY TO_CHAR(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Cn),
TO_CHAR(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Data, 'DD/MM/YYYY'),
Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Pmm;
TableView.layoutSQL: Select * From dual
